constituent: revered, chieftain, Molotov cocktail, animal horns, whiskey bottle, glue
koohiiStory1: People don't know this, but ("revered" patriot) Paul Revere had trouble staying awake during his midnight ride, so he drank Red Bull (horns) and whiskey (a drink invented by his friend Sam Adams) and glued himself DOWN to the saddle. [thanks to akahige].
koohiiStory2: Red Bull, the chieftain (#2906) is so revered in his clan that everyone sticks to him like glue.
kunYomi: たっと.い、とうと.い、たっと.ぶ、とうと.ぶ
readingExamples: 尊い (たっと.い), 尊ぶ (たっと.ぶ), 尊い (とうと.い), 尊ぶ (とうと.ぶ)
words: precious, valuable, priceless, noble, exalted, sacred
to value, to prize, to esteem
